dart_monkey.name: Dart Monkey
dart_monkey.description: Throws a single dart that can pop one bloon

path1.name: Sharp Shooter
path1.description: Improved accuracy, range and special ammunition

upgrades.name: Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: +3 pierce

upgrades.name: Razor Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: +2 pierce, +1 damage

upgrades.name: Spike-o-pult
upgrades.description: Throws spiked balls instead of darts. +4 damage, +18 pierce, but slower attack speed

upgrades.name: Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Hurls heavy juggernaut that crushes through bloons. +14 damage, +76 pierce

upgrades.name: Ultra-Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Ultra-hard spiked balls crush through everything. +80 damage, splits on impact

upgrades.name: Quick Shots
upgrades.description: Attacks 15% faster

upgrades.name: Triple Shot
upgrades.description: Throws 3 darts instead of 1

upgrades.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Ability: Converts nearby Dart Monkeys into Super Monkeys temporarily. +1 damage

upgrades.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Better ability and Dart Monkey becomes a Plasma Monkey. +8 damage, +4 pierce

upgrades.name: Avatar of Wrath
upgrades.description: Ultimate Druid transformation. Massive damage and abilities

path3.name: Seeking Darts
path3.description: Darts that can seek out and follow bloons

upgrades.name: Long Range Darts
upgrades.description: +8 range, can see camo bloons

upgrades.name: Enhanced Eyesight
upgrades.description: +10 range, can see camo bloons

upgrades.name: Crossbow
upgrades.description: Powerful crossbow that shoots bolts. +1 damage, +2 pierce, +18 range

upgrades.name: Sharp Shooter
upgrades.description: Incredibly accurate shots can ricochet to nearby targets. +1 damage, +40 range

upgrades.name: Crossbow Master
upgrades.description: Each shot splits into 3 bolts that seek nearby bloons. +7 damage, massive range

upgrades.name: Faster Shooting
upgrades.description: Shoots tacks faster

upgrades.name: Even Faster Shooting
upgrades.description: Shoots tacks even faster

upgrades.name: Hot Shots
upgrades.description: Hot tacks can pop Lead Bloons and deal extra damage

upgrades.name: Ring of Fire
upgrades.description: Continuous ring of fire around the Tack Shooter

upgrades.name: Inferno Ring
upgrades.description: Bigger, hotter ring of fire with increased damage

path2.name: Bigger Tacks
path2.description: Bigger tacks with more range and pierce

upgrades.name: Long Range Tacks
upgrades.description: +5 range

upgrades.name: Super-Wide Tacks
upgrades.description: +2 pierce, +2 range

upgrades.name: Blade Shooter
upgrades.description: Shoots sharp blades instead of tacks. +2 damage, +4 pierce

upgrades.name: Blade Maelstrom
upgrades.description: Ability: Covers nearby area in a storm of blades. +1 damage

upgrades.name: Super Maelstrom
upgrades.description: Much more powerful blade storm ability. +6 damage

path3.name: Tack Sprayer
path3.description: Shoots different types of specialized tacks

upgrades.name: Tacks Zone
upgrades.description: Shoots tacks that create damage zones

upgrades.name: Road Spikes
upgrades.description: Periodically drops road spikes on the track

upgrades.name: Spike Storm
upgrades.description: Ability: Covers the entire track with spikes. +1 damage to tacks

upgrades.name: Carpet of Spikes
upgrades.description: More powerful spike storm with permanent spike carpet

upgrades.name: Permaspike
upgrades.description: Creates a permanent pile of spikes that grows stronger over time

boomerang_monkey.name: Boomerang Monkey
boomerang_monkey.description: Throws a boomerang that flies out and comes back

upgrades.name: Improved Rangs
upgrades.description: +5 range, flies further before returning

upgrades.name: Glaives
upgrades.description: Razor sharp glaives replace boomerangs. +1 damage, +4 pierce

upgrades.name: Glaive Ricochet
upgrades.description: Glaives ricochet between up to 6 targets. +1 damage, +26 pierce

upgrades.name: M.O.A.R Glaives
upgrades.description: Throws 4 glaives at once. +1 damage

upgrades.name: Glaive Lord
upgrades.description: Orbiting glaives provide constant defense. +6 damage to thrown glaives

path2.name: Kylie Boomerang
path2.description: Boomerangs that don't return but travel further

upgrades.name: Faster Throwing
upgrades.description: Throws boomerangs 18% faster

upgrades.name: Faster Rangs
upgrades.description: Boomerangs fly faster and attack speed increased

upgrades.name: Kylie Boomerang
upgrades.description: Boomerang travels in straight line through all bloons. +1 damage, +27 pierce

upgrades.name: MOAB Domination
upgrades.description: Does extra damage to MOAB-class bloons. +8 damage vs MOABs

upgrades.name: MOAB Assassin
upgrades.description: Ability: Launches devastating attack against strongest bloon

upgrades.name: Long Range Rangs
upgrades.description: +8 range, +1 pierce

upgrades.name: Sonic Boom
upgrades.description: Boomerangs create sonic booms that stun bloons

upgrades.name: Red Hot Rangs
upgrades.description: Burning boomerangs can pop Lead Bloons. +1 damage

upgrades.name: Bionic Boomerang
upgrades.description: Bionic enhancement allows greater speed and power. +1 damage, faster attacks

upgrades.name: Turbo Charge
upgrades.description: Ability: Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time. +2 damage

bomb_shooter.name: Bomb Shooter
bomb_shooter.description: Shoots bombs that explode on impact

upgrades.name: Bigger Bombs
upgrades.description: +8 blast radius

upgrades.name: Heavy Bombs
upgrades.description: +1 damage, +10 pierce, can damage Black Bloons

upgrades.name: Really Big Bombs
upgrades.description: +2 damage, +30 pierce, +10 blast radius

upgrades.name: Big One
upgrades.description: Huge explosion with massive damage. +15 damage, +100 pierce

upgrades.name: Big Bloon Sabotage
upgrades.description: Ability: Damages and slows all bloons on screen. +6 damage

upgrades.name: Faster Reload
upgrades.description: Reloads and shoots 18% faster

upgrades.name: Missile Launcher
upgrades.description: Shoots guided missiles instead of bombs. +15 range

upgrades.name: MOAB Mauler
upgrades.description: Extra damage to MOAB-class bloons. +17 damage vs MOABs

upgrades.name: MOAB Assassin
upgrades.description: Ability: Devastating attack against strongest MOAB-class bloon

upgrades.name: MOAB Eliminator
upgrades.description: Much more powerful ability, regular attacks do more MOAB damage

path3.name: Cluster Bombs
path3.description: Bombs that split into smaller explosive fragments

upgrades.name: Extra Range
upgrades.description: +8 range

upgrades.name: Frag Bombs
upgrades.description: Bombs split into 8 fragments on explosion

upgrades.name: Cluster Bombs
upgrades.description: Main explosion spawns 8 smaller bombs. +1 damage to main explosion

upgrades.name: Recursive Cluster
upgrades.description: Cluster bombs spawn more cluster bombs. +1 damage

upgrades.name: Bomb Blitz
upgrades.description: Ability triggers when bloons leak, massive recursive explosions. +2 damage
